comments:
Reproduce:
1) Start STEM
2) Double click on a Scenario in the Scenario view
3) When the map is displayed in the Map View, click on the "Stop" button in the Simulation Control View.  The exception will be in the erorr log.

I have checked in a fix to this bug. Please test it, and if the exception is gone in your system as well, please close the bug. NOTE : Initially this bug was under component ATNA, I switched it to STEM
